title: ARAM 3 years on and still broken
body:
Ever considered fixing your game riot?
A lot of people enjoy more PVP and a lot less PVE so play aram, however the champs are not balanced especially heals

When damage < heals like late game soraka and alistar then the game is broken.

Please fix, its not all about summoners rift.

replies.body:
1. buy morello's
2. buy mr
3. ????
4. profit


In all seriousness though, it's designed to be random - i.e. not designed to be 100% balanced. This only happens every 20 games or so
